testcase.classname: US1001 Kullanici database'e baglanip bilgileri okuyabilir
testcase.name: TC01 kullanici database baglanip istedigi bilgileri okuyabilmeli

failure.message: The driver could not establish a secure connection to SQL Server by using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption. Error: "PKIX path building failed: sun.security.provider.certpath.SunCertPathBuilderException: unable to find valid certification path to requested target". ClientConnectionId:0c2873b1-1c4a-4ce2-9c52-49f0c0deed79

testcase.failure:
